response_parsed.title: Containerizing REST APIs using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to containerize a REST API built with FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understand Docker and its importance in application deployment and portability
Install FastAPI and Uvicorn, the ASGI server, for creating a FastAPI app
Prepare a Dockerfile to build the container image
Run the container and test the API
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this tutorial.
caveats: This example assumes Docker and Docker Compose are installed on your machine.
Replace the FastAPI application code with your own API implementation.
Modify the Dockerfile to match your project's requirements (e.g., dependencies, environment variables).
